eligibility: Passed 10+2 examination (H.S.) of the Council of Higher Secondary Education, West Bengal or equivalent
Qualified Joint Entrance Examination conducted by West Bengal Joint Entrance Examinations Board / JEE(Main) conducted by Central Board of Secondary Education and recommended by the WBJEE Board
seats_allotment: 80% seats to be filled from qualified WBJEE candidates, 10% from qualified JEE (Main) candidates (through wbjeeb counselling wbjeeb.nic.in ) and 10% under Management Quota for candidates having valid rank cards of WBJEE / JEE (Main).
An additional intake of 10% of the approved intake in the 2nd year (Lateral Entry) from Diploma holders and B.Sc degree holders through JELET conducted by WBJEE Board.
